channel.title: Making a npc appear when you click on an item [pi]
channel.description:
Ok so im currently working on impementing a 317 loading 634 cache into my server and i would like to know if anyone knows how to make it so when i used the "summon" action on a.. pack yak pouch for example it would summon the pack yak npc and make it follow you
id's for it are
npc:6873
item:12093
please note also that the option to summing is the 2nd option so i mean like in the menu when you right click it goes
use pack yak pouch summon pack yak pouch drop pack yak pouch examine pack yak pouch

item.title: Making a npc appear when you click on an item [pi]
item.dc:creator: @patargangstar patargangstar
item.description:
@patargangstar wrote:

Ok so im currently working on impementing a 317 loading 634 cache into my server and i would like to know if anyone knows how to make it so when i used the “summon” action on a… pack yak pouch for example it would summon the pack yak npc and make it follow you

id’s for it are

npc:6873

item:12093

please note also that the option to summing is the 2nd option so i mean like in the menu when you right click it goes

use pack yak pouch
summon pack yak pouch
drop pack yak pouch
examine pack yak pouch

Read full topic
item.source: Making a npc appear when you click on an item [pi]
